name: TinyTale
description:
Made for the jam RPG Maker Games made in 1 hour.

It's a little experiment: a classic J-RPG where you must open the doors of the final temple... except battles are played instantly by the computer. Your mission is to explore this tiny world while managing your HP and potions!

Graphics by surt

I didn't have time for sound! Play with your own music :)

An English version is coming soon, but don't worry, it's pretty straightforward even in French!
